Package com.bakdata.dedupe.similarity

Class CosineSimilarityMeasure<C extends java.util.Collection<? extends E>,​E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bakdata.dedupe.similarity.CosineSimilarityMeasure<C,​E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the element type.
    C - the collection type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollectionSimilarityMeasure<C,​E>, SimilarityMeasure<C>
    public class CosineSimilarityMeasure<C extends java.util.Collection<? extends E>,​E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements CollectionSimilarityMeasure<C,​E>
    Calculates the cosine similarity measure over two bags of elements.

    It first calculates the histograms of the two bags, interprets them as count vectors, and computes the cosine similarity.

    This measure is suited for medium to long texts.

        Description copied from interface: CollectionSimilarityMeasure
        Calculates the similarity ignoring the trivial cases of empty input collections.
        Specified by:
        calculateNonEmptyCollectionSimilarity in interface CollectionSimilarityMeasure<C extends java.util.Collection<? extends E>,​E>
        Parameters:
        left - the non-empty, leftCollection element for which the similarity should be calculated.
        right - the non-empty, rightCollection element for which the similarity should be calculated.
        context - the context of the comparison.
        Returns:
        the similarity [0; 1] or SimilarityMeasure.unknown() if no comparison can be performed (for example if leftCollection or rightCollection are null).
